ygData.subject: RE: warrior upgrade in new patch
ygData.msgSnippet: I asked this question long ago.  But have since found the answers to the quest.  I will not gi ve the secret away, but I will give the start location and a
ygData.messageBody:
I asked this question long ago. But have since found the answers to the
quest. I will not gi ve the secret away, but I will give the start location
and a hint. The start is in Kalidim warriors guild and has to do with the
cleaner. You have to have good faction with the dawarven warriors there.
(You must be a warrior to do the quest as well from what I know.) Your
faction must be at least amiable I think also. The quest is very long and
takes traveling all over the world to complete. Hope that gives you the
info you need to start the quest.

Dyvim Kincaid 32
Cazic Thule
Daks 20
Quellious (or however you spell it *grin)


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tom Swift [mailto:tswift@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 11:52 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] warrior upgrade in new patch
>
>
> From: "Tom Swift" <tswift@...>
>
> Can anyone tell me where the avenger axe quest starts?
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Wofford <James.Wofford@...>
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
> Date: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 1:33 PM
> Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] warrior upgrade in new patch
>
>
> From: James Wofford <James.Wofford@...>
>
> My character that I am referring to is my second character. I have not
> checked the stats on Dyvim yet. Dyvim is level 32, and I have
> not logged in
> with him for a while, will need to check him for the record. My second
> warrior on Quellious is level 20. My critical strikes both hit for 59
> points with a strength of 125 weilding the avenger axe damage 16
> i believe.
> Hit points i believe are at 649. Hope this helps.. I will try to remember
> to play Dyvim tonight to get the stats on him, tho I can not
> really remember
> how many hit points I had before the patch, its been a while
> since I played
> him.
>
> Dyvim Kincaid 32
> Cazic Thule
> Daks 20
> Quellious (or however you spell it *grin)>

> > From: Trent Carroll [mailto:trent@...]

> >
> > For my reference what is your character level?

> > 50. Someone
> > said they read that in the patch message. I read the entire
> patch message
> > (I thought) and saw nothing mentioned at all.
> >
> > Kindrael
